title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.13 - Cargo handling
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.13 - Cargo handling

State Regulations

All stevedoring work, and the handling of cargo to and from
a terminal, must be performed in a manner and with equipment satisfactory to
the Port Authority from a safety standpoint, but the Port Authority assumes no
responsibility for the performance of such work. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1241.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
